content: Want to take a wild GUESS as to whose fault it is that the Senate is a failed institution? TRY DEMS! It was the southern Dems who forced the Declaration and the Constitution to NOT preclude Slavery to start with; it was the DEMS who pushed the 17th Amendment through, cutting Senators loose from the control of their home states’ legislatures. And it will be the DEMS who bring down the Constitutional gov’t of this nation when it falls.
